hypothesis_content.title: Liquidity Shock Recovery in Meme Coins
hypothesis_content.statement: When high-liquidity meme coins (DOGE, PEPE) experience >25% drawdown in 24 hours during NEUTRAL regime without fundamental catalyst, they rebound 40% of losses within next 48 hours as liquidity normalizes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins attract retail liquidity that overreacts to technical moves. Excessive selling without catalyst creates oversold conditions that algorithmic traders and market makers exploit for mean reversion.
entry_conditions: DOGE or PEPE drops >25% in 24 hours
No major fundamental news (exchange delisting, hack, regulatory action)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 40% recovery from intraday low or 15% gain from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Drawdown continues beyond 30% or fails to show stabilization within 6 hours of initial drop.
